metadata.name: Personalised Song Token
metadata.description:
Owning this song token entitles the collector to 1 personalised song once burned. 

This includes:  
1x30 minute phone call / interview with Emily Faye to find out who you want the song to be written for, what style, instrumentation, and to learn all about the specific lyric elements youâ€™d like to be included. If you would rather stay anonymous a simple Dm or Email exchange will work just fine. 

An Mp3/Wav will be provided of the song as well as optional minting and transfer of the track. Optional extras include custom Artwork created for the piece. 

The owner will have full usage rights of the song, 
Emily Faye will retain the Songwriting rights and must be credited. 

Token Design Created by Bstract 
"12" Vinyl Record" Inspired by AleixoAlonso licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
